bibl.title: The Basilikos Grammateus.
bibl.note: The role of the basilikos grammateus in the Ptolemaic bureaucracy needs to be formulated without reference to the developments of the Roman period. - P. 258: Appendix. List of Documents from the Third Century B.C. mentioning the βασιλικοὶ γραμματεῖς.

bibl.title: Life in a Multi-Cultural Society: Egypt from Cambyses to Constantine and Beyond

bibl.seg: OATES John F., The Basilikos Grammateus.
Janet H. JOHNSON (Ed.), Life in a Multi-Cultural Society: Egypt from Cambyses to Constantine and Beyond = SAOC. 51 (Chicago, 1992) pp. 255-258.

The role of the basilikos grammateus in the Ptolemaic bureaucracy needs to be formulated without reference to the developments of the Roman period. - P. 258: Appendix. List of Documents from the Third Century B.C. mentioning the βασιλικοὶ γραμματεῖς.
